original: Bergquist, Anders Teodor, generalmajor, Göteborg, f. 21/9/87 i Skara av bankdir. Conrad B. o. Anna Gadde. G. 13 m. Astri Trägårdh. Barn: Lennart f. 15, arkit., Gbg, Birgitta 18, g. m. kapten Sten Lindqvist, Borås, Karl-Erik 20, fänr., Sthlm. — KHS 24-25. Off. v. Västg. reg. 08, kapt. 26, v. Älvsb. reg. 28, rikskomm. f. ekonom, försv iberedsk. 31-33, major v. gen:-staben 33, stabschef h. mil :befälh. f. Övre Norrl. 33-35, öv:löjtn. v. gen:- staben 35, stabschef i inf:insp. 35-38, överste i gen: stabskåren 37, chef f. Älvsb. reg. 38-42, ställf. mikbefälh. 42-44, gen:major på res:stat 44. KSO-Ikl, RVO, LKrVA.
translated: Bergquist, Anders Teodor, Major General, Gothenburg, born on September 21st 1887 in Skara, son of bank director Conrad B. and Anna Gadde. Married for 13 years to Astri Trägårdh. Children: Lennart, born in 1915, architect in Gothenburg; Birgitta, born in 1918, married to Captain Sten Lindqvist in Borås; Karl-Erik, born in 1920, second lieutenant in Stockholm. Attended the Royal Swedish Army Staff College from 1924 to 1925. Officer of the Västergötland Regiment in 1908, Captain in 1926, Vice Commander of the Älvsborg Regiment in 1928, served as National Commissioner for Defense Economics Preparedness from 1931 to 1933. Major in the General Staff from 1933, Chief of Staff for Military Command in Upper Norrland from 1933 to 1935. Lieutenant Colonel in the General Staff in 1935, Chief of Staff for the Infantry Inspectorate from 1935 to 1938. Colonel in the General Staff Corps in 1937, Commander of the Älvsborg Regiment from 1938 to 1942, Deputy Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces from 1942 to 1944, Major General in the reserve from 1944. Awarded the Order of the Sword, Knight 1st Class, Royal Order of Vasa and the Royal Swedish Academy of War Sciences.

affiliation.name: National Commissioner for Defense Economics Preparedness

award.name: Royal Swedish Academy of War Sciences
